name: Harpoon Hero!
description:
You are the Harpoon Hero! Set out on a mini quest to defeat Sharko, with his killer dance moves and Octopod minions, all while defending your shorefront! Basic shooter where enemies come in waves until the boss appears. Then it's on to the next round. Developed in GameSalad. Art work created in Adobe Illustrator.

Give it a test run here on the GameSalad Arcade

http://arcade.gamesalad.com/games/140331
